message: I have a project coming up where we will be using RabbitMQ with Celery to push some messages around. The original message we get from another company but it's from an MSMQ. Is there a program we can install that watches the MSMQ and pulls the messages from it and pushes it to the designated RabbitMQ queue?
The system we are running is on a server running Ubuntu.
If there is nothing, is there a library (preferably Python) that I can use to do this? To get the messages from an MSMQ.
Is this a stupid question or the wrong place? :)

Microsoft MQ?  I've never done it myself, but I found this (rather old) article that talks about it -- seems to require the win32com library, which I haven't touched in probably 5 years, no idea what its current state is.   http://forums.devshed.com/python-programming-11/python-and-msmq-202399.html
I'll have a look at it and report back :) Thanks.
